content: inspired by the many pothos plants around my home this sock is leafy and vibrant it features twisted stitches resembling vines and stems and leaf lace featuring a centered leaf influenced by japanese knitting involving simple decreases and twisted stitches forming a complex all over pattern it ends with a beautifully finished toe that evokes vines growing out of the soil size s m l finished measurements foot circumference 8 8 75 9 5 inches/ 20 5 22 5 24 5 cm foot length adjustable choose a size with approximately 1 inch/2 5 cm of negative ease in the foot circumference materials yarn grey sock cascade heritage sock 75% merino 25% nylon 437 yards/400 metres per 100 gram skein colourway 5602 steel green sock madelinetosh sock 100% superwash merino wool 395 yards/361 meters per 100 gram skein colourway moorland yarn characteristics these socks are knit with a wool and nylon blend yarn for durability use a solid or nearly solid yarn with good stitch definition to show off the pattern recommended needle size always use a needle size that gives you the gauge listed below - every knitter s gauge is unique 1 set us #1 /2 25 mm needles for small circumference in the round
